lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal was present during a botched child pornography raid last month while working in Virginia as a reserve sheriff’s deputy. O’Neal, who pursues his interest in law enforcement during the off-season, denied yesterday taking part in serving the search warrant at the wrong house Sept. 23. Bedford County Sheriff’s Lt. Michael Harmony, however, confirmed that O’Neal was there. O’Neal, in Orlando, Fla., to play a preseason game yesterday, was asked about the raid and several times somewhat playfully responded, “It wasn’t me.” Authorities said they had been given the wrong I.P. address, which Internet service providers can use to identify users, leading them to the wrong physical address.
